name: places/ChIJazlAU1BYwokRiiggjl8UR-I
adrFormatAddress: 726 10th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
First time visiting and I had the most amazing facial with Kerri! She explained everything she did and gave lots of useful advice for my acne. I also appreciated that her hands were gentle. She is a skilled esthetician and made me feel super comfortable.

Mona at the front desk was very sweet and helpful also. I loved the experience so much I decided to get a package. I highly recommend coming here

originalText.text: I have been going to SKN spa for facials for many years now and I am always happy with my experience there. Kerri is the best. Every time I see Kerri she takes care of my skin no matter what condition it is in. After every facial with her she makes my skin glow. Kerri is very knowledgeable on what your skin needs. She always gives me the best service and makes my skin look its best.  have recommended Kerri to many of my friends and anyone I know that has had a facial with her is always pleased. SKN gives you great service at great prices. If you want your skin to glow and look it’s best, see Kerri!!

originalText.text: Jessie is unbelievable!!! She takes the time to explain everything and why one should get the services. She educated me about the RF Firming facial and ladies it took YEARS off of my life and I mean years! I highly recommend SKN and Jessie. It was extremely relaxing. I’m looking forward to coming back.

text.text: Jessie is unbelievable!!! She takes the time to explain everything and why one should get the services. She educated me about the RF Firming facial and ladies it took YEARS off of my life and I mean years! I highly recommend SKN and Jessie. It was extremely relaxing. I’m looking forward to coming back.

originalText.text: I am new to getting facials regularly and my esthetician, Kerri, who I luckily got scheduled with at my first appointment, made me feel really comfortable and talk through each step of the process. Given this is a new routine for me, I always appreciate the extra effort and information. I ended up buying a package after my first visit and have had 2 more appointments since. My skin looks great and definitely have seen some improvements. I highly recommend Kerri who is very thorough, friendly and very knowledgeable about all things skincare! Love this place so much, I had to put my partner on :) (please be aware, unexpected napping may occur lol - this place always has me at my most relaxed and stress-free self)

originalText.text:
Second time here yesterday. First time was back in 2019 and in their old space. I like this new place better.

My husband and I were the first hour appointments on a Sunday morning so understanding it was a Sunday, it was a slower start but no complaints, the least you can do on a Sunday is make it less relaxing. We both got the Customized Facial which was 90 mins so I like that the aesthetician took her time to assess my skin's current state and see what I especially needed for the day. I got Yoyo and not only was she nice and fun to talk to, I felt that she was thorough and while extractions hurt like a mother, you actually want that to fully clean your skin's congestion and mine was due to the amount of flying and travels I did during the summer. I also pretty enjoy how clean the room and overall place was (and so is the bathroom especially!) and that I get to be tucked in a weighted blanket when I got a bit chilly. Lastly, I especially love Eminence products. They're not cheap and they definitely deliver glowing results. I've trusted it through the years.

All these and more made us get a package. So there'll definitely be more SKN spa sessions in store! Will update the review as applicable. Thanks Yoyo and SKN Spa team!
